Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using RISCO Home skill you can arm your RISCO security system, check the system status and control your smart home devices connected to the system. You can control lights, shades, boiler, thermostats, etc. and check their status. You can ask for the device's measured temperature, battery status, ask to activate scenes or a turn on/off a single device.

Enable RISCO Home skill and follow the instructions to link your account to your RISCO site. You will need to provide the PIN code for the site to grant permissions to the site.
